title: Posting to boards
body: Not sure if this is the right place for this.  I haven't posted in the boards before and am wondering how you go about getting started?  Is there a thread explaining it?  I read the Universal Rules post and the guidelines, but am still having trouble.  It says that I'm not high enough level to comment, & create a discussion (in every other section of the boards) and I have no idea what that means.  Thanks in advance.

replies.body: When you are posting for the first time, your account needs to sync with the boards.  It looks like your post here has done just that.  You should be able to post now, but let me know if you still have any problems.  A really great thread for new posters is the [Formatting ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/YHPBc6k3-board-formatting-101)guide!  Let me know if you have any questions, and welcome to the boards!
